# modifiers

**Instance Property**

Key modifier flags representing keyboard keys pressed by the user at the time of this request.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var modifiers: UIKeyModifierFlags { get }
```

## Inspecting the region request

- **location**: The location of the pointer in the interaction’s view’s coordinate space.
